question: This state assembly has become the first in India to call attention and adjournment motions and proposals online from legislators.
explanation: Rajasthan State assembly has become the first in India to call attention and adjournment motions and proposals online from legislators. The new online system was inaugurated by Rajasthan Assembly Speaker Speaker Kailash Meghwal by sending a call for an attention motion to the state government with a click of mouse. It will facilitate smooth exchange of information and reports among respective departments.
